bullets: Orchestrated the migration of 4 corporate websites from WordPress to a Jamstack architecture (Hugo), serving as the solo technical lead for architectural decisions and stack selection.
Engineered a modular Component Library (Shortcodes) and comprehensive documentation system, empowering non-technical teams (HR/Marketing) to deploy complex layouts without engineering support
Architected a high-performance static web infrastructure using Hugo, replacing dynamic WordPress deployments to improve site security, load times, and scalability.
Modernized the frontend architecture of 4 corporate sites, migrating from monolithic WordPress themes to a component-based Hugo implementation.
